author: B Zaheen
comment: This app is exactly wt i wanted. But needs to be improved. It reminds on wrong timings. While entering time, sometimes doesnt accept our choice of time. It wld be wonderfull if a calendar shows our engagement on a particular day. The tasks shld be shown in simple list form. Recording shld be improved. Its v slow.
title: Nice but fix the bugs

author: Ted Moore
comment: I wish I had developed this, lol. I plan on making a donation to the "starving artist"--using the app to remind myself, of course! Kudos to the dev. Shared an invite immediately after testing. UPDATE: ALSO SHARED TO FACEBOOK. 😁

author: Thomas Doherty
comment: The best location reminder in the store…  hands down. Really nice app, great job!! My only critique is your logo…  though clever, it is really hard to see what it says especially on the widget. Keep up the good work and you will be rewarded handsomely!!!

author: Sergy Nall
comment: Great app, but it does not wake up my phone. So if I don't have a normal alarm set, it won't go off in the morning until press the home button.

author: rick barker
comment: I just started using it but so far the user interface makes it really easy to use and I like that it has a pop-up option and you can choose to have the message read automatically or wait until you tap on the pop-up. Very nice developer keep it up!
title: Awesome

author: Todd Landree
comment: Originally five stars. Keeps nagging me to rate after I've already rated. So now it's one star. Hope you're happy.

Extremely easy to use doesn't falter and you can add your voice or your own music or noise or whatever you want to put in there that's a nice little program to have because I can't remember anything :-)

author: Rakesh Yadav
comment: Great app!! It serves the purpose, on a side note some cosmetic changes are required to make it look modern like icons, logo etc

author: Kamal Langalia
comment: Persistent reminders. Customizable persistent setting for each reminder.
It's an awesome app,the most brilliant feature is that the reminder pops up on home screen,I was looking for such an app ,today I have found it,thanks

author: Christopher Minor
comment: This app has such potential
title: Very practical app

author: Laura Dobson
comment: This is such a remarkable app, it's the first one I have used of many that actually works,  and reminds me every time,  love it

author: Shailesh Dalal
comment: Changing voice issue solved by selecting different file format. So giving 5 star 🌟. To my experince this is THE BEST AUDIO REMINDER on Android platform. You done great work very precisely. I want to buy this app.

reply.author: Brandon Andrews
reply.content: Thank you for your kind words it means the world to me

title: Use this app to know PERFACTION !! 🇻🇳🇻🇳🇻🇳🇻🇳🇻🇳🇻🇳🇻🇳🇻🇳🇻🇳🇻🇳🇻🇳🇻🇳🇻🇳🇻🇳🇻🇳

author: jake rialas
comment: BEST APP.. its worst than my X nagging wife,  but gets my job done...love it

author: Joan Dobbyn
comment: A great idea, it certainly an asset to me. Thank you.
default time should be setup by user.

author: Ajay Misra
comment: Terrific,  Brandon.  Just loved it. Practical and useful.  You knew what we need.
title: Excellent!

author: sazzadul hoq
comment: I like this app very much, it's like what I wanted. 5star!

author: Donald McCullough
comment: Straight forward and easy to use. Just what I was looking for.

author: Jeffer James Quirante
comment: Unique app. No need to type it out.

author: Rob Summers
comment: Simple to use, very useful.

author: Saeed H Mohammed
comment: Work great so far

author: iskender .yılmaz
comment: just perfect
Nice unique

author: MARIA NATHDWARA
comment: Good effort

author: grey
comment: Works well. Not quite intuative but fairly easy to figure out. Even for an old timer! (68)
title: Good app!

author: Abu Humaira
comment: All good

author: dudly70
comment: Very good and useful app. I would like to donate you but Google play doesn't allow to pay for that. I'm confused
title: Audio reminder

author: Pratik Pandya
comment: You can use this App with your own voice and tone
title: Nice Reminder for those who like to work with assistant.

author: Happy Tappy
comment: Love it easy to use task goodness!

author: Tam Rutherford
comment: Best app I have in my phone, awesome, when I remember something during the day I set a reminder.

author: manoj soni
comment: Unfortunately stopped
title: Stopped

author: Gerry Cee
comment: A diary was useless for me, I would forget to look in it! ! !  With this App as long as your phone is with you, you won't forget anything .    Ever. .
title: Great

author: Andrew Mass
comment: I Love it. So much to do and remember, not enough memory cells in the brain... Lol  Also useful for music related ideas to record when they pop up out of no where. Two questions, is there a way to extend the length of recording reminder beyond 15 seconds ? Also is there a way to mute the reminders from going off if you happen to be at a meeting for example ?
title: Audio Reminder Pro Is Awesome!!!!

author: Boonyarit
comment: Excelent app and serve the purpose. However, I wud rate 5 stars if you could add an option to prevent it from playing the record automatically but when u press a "play" button. This is hepful in a situation like you are in the meeting, then all of a sudden an Audio Reminder sounds your voice of private message in the mid of meeting conversation. Would be a matter to be laughed at, wouldn't it?

author: Hawaiiboy
comment: I really like this app. Now I can remind myself about picking something up on the way home. This app will really come in handy for me. I forget about things that I need to do all the time. It works really well in Galaxy S4.
title: Really cool app!

author: Graeme Turnwald
comment: So useful. I use it every day to remind myself about all sorts of stuff, especially when im driving.I would like the reminder volume to be adjustable via main volume ajustment, but great app.
title: Really great app!

author: roger washere
comment: Yes it works sort of - overrides in coming phone calls so that the person on the the other end of the call thinks that you have gone mad because of reminder audio trying to take over the conversation . When trying to review recorded reminders some play some don't while others only play snippets of the recordings - needs some fine tuning before I would give it a 5 star
title: Audio reminder Pro

author: Dave Wild
comment: Great app...I've such a bad memory. With this, I get a good chance of remembering that thingy. ..

author: T Winningham
comment: I like it alot, wish I could do backups/restores
title: Audio reminder pro
